name: Trump Stamp
description:
He is misunderstood. He is a victim of fake news. But now you can slip into his shoes, take control of his great, manly hands and learn, that making America great again is not as easy as you might have thought.

Controls:

SPACE, Left Mouse = Stamp executive order (or not),
X, Right Mouse = Shake hands,
Left and Right arrows = Move, well, left and right

Update 1.1: More "decisions" to make. Touch control. Bugfixes. We have the best updates. They are tremendous.

Also available for free at the Google Play Store.
